rooms.description: Provides a spacious entrance and circulation area for guests, aligned with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Open-plan living space that merges with the kitchen for social interaction; features large windows to capture natural light and eco-friendly ventilation.
Well-designed, energy-efficient open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Uses sustainable materials and efficient appliances.
A landscaped courtyard that serves as a natural light well and ventilation hub, contributing to eco-friendly design and energy efficiency.
Private living area for the household staff. Designed with basic amenities while ensuring privacy.

openings.dimensions: 5x4 ft, multiple units for optimal natural light and ventilation
5x4 ft, eco-friendly glazing to reduce heat gain
Varied sizes for cross ventilation and light diffusion

notes: This design adheres to local building norms in India and incorporates Vastu principles for optimal spatial layout and energy flow. Eco-friendly features include natural ventilation, sustainable material usage, and energy-efficient appliances.
